nodes.text: Gade Yedan was Gyr Keela's assistant at the Mrlsst Trade and Science Academy. He held Keela in great contempt, feeling that the Mrlssi was nothing more than bluster and had no ability.

Yedan was involved in the plot to steal the plans for the Phantom Project's cloaking device, and the discrediting of Rogue Squadron. In this capacity, he reported directly to Loka Hask. However, Hask shot him shortly before Rorax Falken's lab was consumed by a wormhole created by the gravitic polarization beam.
